distinct
from expense_applay_hotel
order by ${orderByClause}

update expense_applay_hotel
staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_name = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_depart = #{staffDepart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hotel_name = #{hotelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
money_cost = #{moneyCost,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
days_cost = #{daysCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detail_explain = #{detailExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_user_id = #{staffUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trip_id = #{tripId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
applay_status = #{applayStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approver_order = #{approverOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approver_history = #{approverHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approver_now = #{approverNow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refuse_reason = #{refuseReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
submit_time = #{submitTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update expense_applay_hotel set staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_name = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_depart = #{staffDepart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hotel_name = #{hotelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money_cost = #{moneyCost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, days_cost = #{daysCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail_explain = #{detailExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_user_id = #{staffUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trip_id = #{tripId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, applay_status = #{applayStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approver_order = #{approverOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approver_history = #{approverHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approver_now = #{approverNow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refuse_reason = #{refuseReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, submit_time = #{submitTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from expense_applay_hotel where approver_history like CONCAT('%', #{staffUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by staff_name

select staff_name,staff_id,SUM(money_cost) as money_cost from expense_applay_hotel where approver_now = #{staffUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and applay_status = '待审核' and MONTH(submit_time) = (MONTH(CURDATE())-1) group by staff_id
select COUNT(staff_id) from expense_applay_hotel where approver_now = #{staffUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and applay_status = '待审核' and MONTH(submit_time) = (MONTH(CURDATE())-1)
mapper.update: update expense_applay_hotel set applay_status = '驳回' ,refuse_reason = '当前审批人未及时审批,系统自动驳回,请重新提交' where approver_now = #{staffUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and applay_status = '待审核' and MONTH(submit_time) = (MONTH(CURDATE())-1) order by staff_name
